text: :wave: Hi everyone! In October it was announced, that the merge functionality is gonna be updated, live today (see <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/updated-merge-functionality-for-crm-objects-including-contacts-and-companies>). However, I don't recognize any changes so far, is there any resource where I can check if the update is live?
Hey! Anyone has created funnel report around ads, form fills, website visits and etc? I would like check what kind of can be come up using funnel repot type.

I don’t work for HubSpot :sweat_smile:
Raise a support ticket would be my advice.
I had it turned off I made a flexible redirect.

As Rob noted for a quick response the best option is to contact HubSpot Support. <http://Help.HubSpot.com|Help.HubSpot.com>
I also recommend providing any errors you’re seeing, and any troubleshooting steps you’ve tried so they can help you more efficiently.

Concerned about your site’s speed? Test our new Site Speed Dashboard to uncover real user performance trends - not just emulated Lighthouse scores.

We’re looking for 20 more private beta testers. Please comment or DM if interested. This is open to all tiers of Content Hub / CMS.

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.
